plot: This short film tells a story about a long gone history. In a apparently untouched landscape. You need to find the unimaginable there. And then you come to the opposite, deeply sunk in snow...
title: 1918 Video Art Project the Unimaginable
plot_es: This short film tells a story about a long gone history. In a apparently untouched landscape. You need to find the unimaginable there. And then you come to the opposite, deeply sunk in snow...
